task.title: Add a Holiday
task.shortdesc: You can add a group of holidays and set a Time Condition destination for the holidays on your inbound route. When a customer calls to your company during holidays, the PBX will route the call to the pre-configured destination.

step.cmd: Go to Settings PBX Call Control Time Conditions Holiday , click Add.
On the configuration page, set the Name of the holiday.

choices.choice: By Date: If the holiday such as Chinese Spring Festival varies very year, choose this type.
By Month: If the holiday such Chinese National Day always fall on the same calendar date, choose this type.
By Week: If the holiday such as Thanks Giving Day always fall on the same week, choose this type.

step.cmd: Set the date of the holiday.
